memberdef.name: as3935_i2c_read_from

briefdescription.para: AS3935 I2C read from register address transaction. This is a write and then read process.

parameterdescription.para: AS3935 register address to read from.
Buffer to store results from read transaction.
Length of buffer to store results from read transaction.

briefdescription.para: AS3935 I2C write byte to register address transaction.
